Castle in the Clouds Half Marathon Road Race

5k Trail Run & Castle " Challenge"

Sunday November 1st, 2015 at 10:00am

One of the most beautiful and challenging half marathon courses in New Hampshire!

The post race party is one not to miss. For one it is inside and I offer a free beer with registration and the post race food is incredible! Whoopie pies, hot-cider doughnuts, soup, and more!

455 Ossipee Park Rd., Moultonboro, NH. 03894

Parking: Parking located at the Castle in the Clouds parking lot.

Day of Registration : 8a- 9:30a at the Castle Carriage house

Please, no strollers allowed on the trail run and no dogs allowed in the half marathon.

USATF Certified Half Marathon Course

  • Start at the Castle in the Cloud, and continue down the Castle Auto Road
  • Left onto Route 171
  • Right onto Sodom Road
  • Right onto County Road (partial dirt road)
  • Left to make a loop out to 109, then back to County Road
  • Continue onto 109
  • Right onto Severance Road
  • Left onto Route 171
  • Right, back onto the Castle Auto Road (all uphill!)
  • Finish just past the Castle Carriage House near the field at the Lakes Region Conservation Trust Trail system
  • * There will be aid stations at miles 3, 6, 8, 10, and 12, with water and electrolyte drinks *

Half Marathon Description - 13.1 miles

Winding through the rolling roads of Moultonboro and Tuftonboro , runners of the half marathon will take in the mountainous scenery , roaring falls and crisp autumn air. The race starts at the Castle goes down the Castle Auto Road, then follows an undulating course with plenty of hills and finishes with a climb back up the Castle Auto Road making for a spectacular and challenging course. Wonderful views of Shannon Brook and the Ossipee Mountain Range at many points along the Castle Auto Road. A spectator friendly course!

5k Trail Race Description

A 3.1 mile trail run on the beautiful trails of the Lakes Region Conservation Trust on the grounds of the Castle in the Clouds.

Castle " Challenge" Description

Fun and challenging! Runners start at the Castle , descend down the Castle Auto Road , turnaround , and climb back up the Auto Road to the finish!!

Approximately , 3.5 miles total.

***** Costume attire welcome****
Jesters, kings , queens, knights.... the more creative the better!!!
Show us your brightest costume!!!

Overall and age group prizes!

Awards will be a 3d, 3 inch medal with a really cool design of the Castle

Partial Proceeds from the Race Benefit

  • Helping to put an end to child abuse.

  • Castle to the Valley

    Mission of Hope in the Mathare Valley in Nairbobi, Kenya. We will be sponsoring an elementary school aged child for education costs / $38.00 month.

Founder/ Race Director: Robin AllenBurke

Last Event

Thank-you to everyone who sponsored , volunteered , participated and spectated at the inaugural Castle in the Clouds Half Marathon & 5k Trail Race!! on November 2, 2014. What a dynamic day for all! I cannot thank you all of you enough for spending the day with me at the Castle. I hope your experience was as fantastic as mine!
